üßæ Bodega Payment System - Demo

Test the "reverse receipt" payment flow - where the receipt IS the payment page

How It Works

Traditional: Pay ‚Üí Get Receipt
Bodega Reverse: Scan Receipt ‚Üí Pay from Receipt ‚Üí Receipt updates to "PAID"

  • Bodega receipt aesthetic (Courier New font, barcodes, perforated edges)
  • Stripe Payment Link embedded in receipt-styled page
  • Alternative payment methods (Venmo, Cash App, PayPal)
  • QR code links directly to payment receipt
  • Works 100% static on GitHub Pages

üìù Example Usage

Generate Bodega Payment QR:

  1. Open stpetepros-qr.html
  2. Select: üßæ Stripe (Bodega Receipt)
  3. Enter your Stripe Payment Link ID: test_xxxxx
  4. Amount: $25.00
  5. Description: Plumbing Service
  6. Click "Generate QR Codes"
  7. Download QR code

Customer Flow:

  1. Customer scans QR code
  2. Opens bodega-styled payment receipt
  3. Sees amount and service details in receipt format
  4. Pays via Stripe (or alternative method)
  5. Receipt updates to show "PAID" stamp
  6. Can print or save receipt

üîó Direct URL Format

You can create payment links directly using this URL format:

https://soulfra.github.io/pay-bodega.html?
stripe=test_xxxxx&
amount=25.00&
item=Plumbing+Service&
venmo=testuser&
cashapp=testuser&
paypal=testuser

Query Parameters:

  • stripe - Stripe Payment Link ID (required for Stripe)
  • amount - Payment amount (default: 25.00)
  • item - Service/item description (default: Professional Service)
  • venmo - Venmo username (optional fallback)
  • cashapp - Cash App cashtag (optional fallback)
  • paypal - PayPal username (optional fallback)
  • paid - Set to 'true' to show paid receipt
